verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on ka$af-v

frameset.edef: to uncover or disclose, to reveal

role.argrole: thing being disclosed or discovered. Usually an SBAR

example.parse: (TOP (S (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كشفت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (PRON_3MS ه))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (SBAR-NOM-TPC-2 (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON من)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS حاولت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قتل) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN_PROP ريما) (NOUN_PROP صالح) (NOUN_PROP سعد)) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تعمل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN عيادة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN زوج) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: that the person who tried to kill her was Rima Salih Saad

example.arg: ن من حاولت قتلها كانت ريما صالح سعد التي تعمل في عيادة زوجها

example.parse:
ARG1 is a NP-OBJ
(TOP (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كشفت) (NP-SBJ (PUNC ") (NOUN_PROP هآرتس) (PUNC ")) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC وثيقة)) (SBAR (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV_PASS+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تنشر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-TMP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN لمرة) (DET+ADJ_NUM الاولى)))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: a document that was uncovered for the first time

frameset.comment: Based on roleset ka$af-i.01 Based on roleset ka$af-v.01
Based on roleset ka$af-i.02 Based on roleset ka$af-v.02
